desc: Nanoblock.com.au is the official online destination for nanoblock in Australia offering the largest range of nanoblock micro sized building block sets. Nanoblock is a wonderful hobby, toy, puzzle and collectible gift for those between 8 and 80 years who have outgrown their kid sized building blocks.

layout.text: A collection of micro-sized nanoblock® animals, dinosaurs, critters, musical instruments and more
